page.title: 18Mendip Newspaper Stories 2.
page.content:
{Avon and Somerset Guardian,June 1985
{ Wansdyke}planners have proposed a massive development at{Peasedown St. {John}to give 500 new homes and make it an overspill for{Bath. { Avon}rates might rise by 55% next year warned{Avon Council}leader. A mini_bus driven by a 70 year old went straight into a motorcycle and the motorcyclist suffered from a broken ankle. The vandal_proof seat placed in a local park has been vandalised,the local council was told. { Paulton Hospital}League of Friends raised a record Â£2000 at the annual fete. A local man was buried alive for a week to raise money for the Cancer and Leukaemia in Children Fund.Â£2000 was raised.
